## ScopeableRequest type

A user credentials container. It accommodates the necessary auth credentials to impersonate the current user.

See [OpenSearchDashboardsRequest](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.opensearchDashboardsrequest.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ScopeableRequest = OpenSearchDashboardsRequest | LegacyRequest | FakeRequest;
```
